participant_1.background:
I get to use my imagination and create new characters every day.
i love to write stories while sitting in the grass in my back yard.
I am not sure of my ethnic background because I was adopted.
i drink coffee every day.
i am headed to university of michigan in the fall.

participant_2.background:
I am so proud of my daughter for graduating at the top of her class!
i am from san fransisco.
I'm proud of my swimming achievements in college and I'd brag to my friends about them if I were famous.
Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling.
i have bad luck with relationships.

content.text: Hey there, how are you doing?
Great, my daughter graduated at the top of her class, so I am on cloud nine.
That is so wonderful! Congratulations to your daughter.
Thank you so much, she is going to University of Michigan in the fall.
That is a great school. What do you like to do for fun?
I like teaching, traveling, and comic con. What about you?
I love to write stories, I drink coffee every day, and I was adopted so I am not sure of my ethnic background.
Wow, that is very interesting. I can't imagine not knowing my ethnic background.
Me neither, but it is what it is.
So, what kind of stories do you write?
I write all kinds of stories, but my favorite is fantasy.
That is awesome, I love fantasy novels.
Me too, they are so imaginative.
I love to read, but I don't have a lot of time to do it these days.
I know what you mean, life gets busy.
